description: Ceci est une application React avec traduction.

home_section.name: NAYA AL NAQULA
home_section.description: I am a dedicated and innovative full stack developer with a passion for building dynamic and responsive web applications. With expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies, I thrive on transforming ideas into functional and user-friendly solutions.

services.title: Services
services.description: I provide tailored solutions to help you achieve your goals.Let’s bring your ideas to life
services.ui_ux_description: Create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces through user research, wireframing, prototyping, and visual design for a seamless experience. using Figma .
services.front_end_description: Build responsive, interactive web applications using HTML , CSS , JavaScript , Bootstrap and React ensuring compatibility across devices and browsers.
services.back_end_description: Develop scalable server-side applications, focusing on database management, API development, and secure data handling using Laravel .

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Discover some of my previous works
projects.append_description: I recreated the Append template (originally from BootstrapMade) as a training project to master modern front-end development. This responsive template is designed for startups, apps, and digital services, clean layouts, and optimized performance.
projects.golf_description: A clean, modern Bootstrap 5 template, built from scratch as a training project. Focused on responsive design, performance, and user-friendly interactions. Demonstrates my ability to transform UI designs into functional websites
projects.grand_coffe_description: I recreated the Grand Coffee template as a training project to master food-industry web design. This responsive template is ideal for coffee shops, featuring warm visuals, menu displays, and reservation functionality.
projects.luxary_description: I developed the LuxuryHotel template as a training project to master high-end hospitality web design. This responsive template emphasizes elegance and functionality, featuring room galleries, booking systems, and immersive visuals.
projects.flexStart_description: Upgraded the Flex Start template into an interactive website with CRUD functionality, using React and JSON Server to simulate real API workflows. Demonstrates my ability to integrate frontend UIs with backend logic.
projects.spotify_description: A dynamic dashboard that connects to Spotify’s API to visualize a user’s listening habits. Displays personalized statistics like top artists, tracks, and albums across multiple time ranges, also visualize an artist's statistics like top songs across multiple time ranges, with interactive filters.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Open to new opportunities, collaborations, or just a chat! Reach out for projects, feedback, or a simple hello.
